column6: S/M Ramya Devi H/O Sr Chalitar Safi Dhobi Tol
S/M Fougani Devi H/O Sr Hari Nandan Saday Nanadw an Mahadalit Tol
S/M Malti Devi H/O Sr Musharu Mahto Pasi Tol
S/M Bimla Devi H/O Sr Jibach Ram Rajour
S/M Bhalbhogaya Devi H/O Sr Rabbiram
Kanail Ram Ke Ghar Ke Pas
NANDWAN MAHADALIT TOL TEEN MUHANI KE SAMEEP
KALIMANDIR AND PANCHYAT BHAVAN KE SAMEEP
DIHWAR STHAN KE SAMEEP NONIYA TOL
Jouli Sadai Ke Ghar Ke Pas
Shashi Bhushan Jha Ke Ghar Pas
